subject: Order SSN1717
description_text: Just wanted to check on my order. Ordered a week ago and haven’t received any updates

conversations.body_text: Hi Purestock38j,     Here is the latest tracking information. Please have a look.

Thank you for the update. I see that USPS currently is in possession of my package. Is there a USPS tracking number now?

>
Hi Purestock38j,  There’s no update yet, but typically, once the package is handed over for transfer, it will be delivered shortly.
